text: Jilani (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ): “Mundu jwali nkusokonechela, basi (Allah) Jwaukoto wejinji channundile jwalakwejo ndawi (jaumi wakwe), kwikanila pandema jataachiiona yaakuwa nkupedwa chilanga – mwine ilagasyo kapena ndawi (jakwichila Kiyama) – basi tachimanyilila kuti nduni jwakwete malo gakusakala ni jwaakwete asilikali wangali machilili.”
